pkgmetadata.longdescription: Monotonize Point and Interval Functional Estimates by Rearrangement // The rearrangement operator (Hardy, Littlewood, and Polya 1952) for univariate, bivariate, and trivariate point estimates of monotonic functions. The package additionally provides a function that creates simultaneous confidence intervals for univariate functions and applies the rearrangement operator to these confidence intervals.
